Metadata: Simulation name, analyst, date/time, version, scenario description

Simulation_Interchange: FMU/FMI (Functional Mock-up Interface) if partial usage
Parametric_BestPractices: ISO 15288 if used for lifecycle alignment

PerformanceEstimates: Range, endurance, fuel burn (if param studied)
Initial sizing (weight, wing area, thrust needed)
TradeStudyOutputs: Design variable sweeps, objective function values
Pareto front coordinates or final selected design
ScriptLogs: Matlab command window logs, Python console output
